original_title: Christo & Jeanne Claude - L’art de cacher, l’art de dévoiler
overview: With their spectacular ephemeral works of art, the visual artists Christo and Jeanne-Claude had made prestigious monuments rediscovered under a new light, from the Pont-Neuf to the Reichstag. An enlightening portrait of an artist couple who became stars.
title: Christo & Jeanne Claude - L’art de cacher, l’art de dévoiler
